mapper.insert: insert into site_messages (sender_id, sender_name, title, content, message_type) values (#{senderId}, #{senderName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{messageType})
mapper.select: select * from site_messages where id = (select message_id from user_site_message where user_id = #{userId} and message_id = #{messageId} and is_deleted = 0)

select sm.id, sm.title, sm.content, sm.message_type, sm.created_time, sm.updated_time, sm.sender_id, sm.sender_name from site_messages sm join user_site_message us on sm.id = us.message_id where us.is_deleted = 0
